rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BMS11, BUS1100, ETB1100, ETC1000, ETG1102, ETP1100, ETW1000, ETX1100, PMM2020, SCI1020, STA1010}

Unit was previously coded {7191, DEB164, DEB1640, DEB1640C, DEB1643, DEE1640, DEE1640B, DEE1640BF, DEE1640C, DEE1640M, DEE1640R, DEE1640RM, DEE1640S, DEE1640SM, ECM1640, ECM1640S, ECN1640, ETF1640, ETF1640B, ETF1640M, ETF1640R, ETF1640S, ETF1640W, ETP1100, ETW1020, ETW1102%, ETW1640, ETX1100%, ETX1640%, ETX1642%, FIN164, FIN1640%, FIN166, FIN1660, GAS1751%}

description: Introduction to spreadsheeting. Descriptive statistics. Elementary probability. Discrete and continuous probability distributions. Statistical inference. Simple linear regression and correlation. Forecasting and time series. Index numbers.
